ModMetaData.name: Undergrounders: Deep Fabrics - Vanilla Memes Expanded Vegan Patch
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.5
This mod patches the Vegan meme in Vanilla Meme Expanded so that fungus leather no longer counts as animal leather. This patch is kept separate so Harmony is not needed for the main mod, and for compatibility while mods update to new versions.
This mod REQUIRES either Undergrounders: Deep Fabrics or Undergrounders: Complete in order to function.

li.displayName: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures
